sentences.en: Adult females serve their sentences at Tai Lam Centre for Women, which also remand prisoners.
sentences.cn: 成年女犯在大榄女惩教所服刑.该惩教所也收容还押犯.

sentences.en: Can detention in a remand home be regarded as educational?
sentences.cn: 青少年犯拘留所的拘留能看做是教育 吗 ?

sentences.en: Carter was remanded in custody for seven days.
He absconded from a remand home.
sentences.cn: 他从青少年拘留所潜逃了.

sentences.en: He is currently being held on remand .
He is remand on bail of 3,000.
sentences.cn: 付了3,000英镑保释金后,他被还押.

sentences.en: He was held on remand, charged with causing malicious damage to property.
sentences.cn: 他因恶意破坏财产而被关押候审.

sentences.en: Position from the cover of view, there are welcoming the first chapter and chapter feet remand.
sentences.cn: 从所盖的位置来看, 有迎首章和押脚章.

sentences.en: She has already served a year on remand.
The judge has the power to remand young offenders home until their case be heard.
sentences.cn: 法官有权把青少年犯关押在青少年拘留所直到听证会开始.

sentences.en: The remand hearing is often over in three minutes.
sentences.cn: 取保候审听证会通常在3分钟内结束。
世贸组织争端解决机制缺少补偿机制.

sentences.en: This will mean more remand prisoners being held in police cells.
sentences.cn: 这将意味着更多候审犯人会被拘押在警局拘留室。

sentences.en: Those teenagers will be remanded to the remand home.
sentences.cn: 这些青少年将被送到青少年拘留所(关押候审).

sentences.en: To ask a court to allow a prisoner to is remand on bail.
sentences.cn: 要求法院允许囚犯具保再审.
